Class GroceryReceipt

  • java.lang.Object
    • GroceryReceipt
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscountReceipt

    public class GroceryReceipt
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates a grocery receipt generated by a clerk
    Author:
    Prabhdeep Kainth period 4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GroceryReceipt(Employee clerk)
      Initializes the clerk to the passed in employee, the receipt to an empty string and total to 0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Item i)
      Adds the given item to the receipt Updates the total by adding in the the items price
      Employee getClerk()
      Returns the clerk generating the information
      java.lang.String getReceipt()
      Returns the list of items
      double getTotal()
      Returns the total amount on this receipt in dollars and cents
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string with list of items (one per line) and total receipt amount
      java.lang.String valueToString(double value)
      Returns the value passed as a string in the dollar and cents format ####.##
